about_the_game:
Life was good… Until it wasn’t. I’m Daniel. I was fired by the CIA when they started covering the tracks of their illegal operations. And if that’s not enough, my family in Mexico is going broke. They closed the factory which was the only source of income in the town.

Well, I own the factory now. But keeping it operational costs money. So now I’m going into the BUSINESS. After all, it’s what I know. And I need to keep my family afloat.

SET IN THE WORLD OF NARCOS


DDS x Narcos is a standalone spinoff of Drug Dealer Simulator set in the late 1980s. It marries the universe of the DDS series with the world known from the legendary show Narcos and Narcos Mexico. Explore both sides of the border and the familiar world of two beloved franchises.

GET INTO THE BUSINESS


Make your own substances from scratch, starting with harvesting the cannabis and coca plants all the way to choosing the right additives. And what you cannot farm, buy from your suppliers. Isabella seems to be a good contact in the business…

DDS x Narcos introduces new mechanics and features such as:
  • Smuggling illegal products across the border;
  • Cultivating plants;
  • Realistic production processes;
  • Selling products across the different states;
  • Stats of the mixed product;
  • Money-laundering business;
  • Updated player skills.

CRIME KNOWS NO BORDERS


Play in the US as well as Mexico. Rule over a small town on the southern side of the border, where you will produce and package your product. Try to conquer the familiar Ghetto in the US and see it before it becomes the crime-ridden town you know from DDS.

Smuggle the illegal product across the border to fulfil the orders and sell the product to dealers across the different states. Just don’t get caught!

THE CHOICE IS YOURS


Selling and distributing products is just a means to an end… Or is it? Will you stop once your family is safe again or will you let the power and money corrupt you? Your partner doesn’t seem too keen on getting out of the business, but you were offered a way out. Will you take it? The choice is yours.

FEATURES
  • Produce illegal products from scratch in your factory;
  • Explore the Mexican town and the American Ghetto;
  • Smuggle illegal products across the border and fulfil orders;
  • Launder dirty money;
  • Buy and upgrade hideouts;
  • Grow your influence and earn money;
  • Immerse yourself into the story of ex-CIA agent Daniel;
  • Make choices that affect the ending of your story.

short_description: This is a spinoff of the hit game Drug Dealer Simulator and the legendary show Narcos. It’s the 1980s, and you are a disgraced CIA agent turned drug dealer. In this story-driven simulator about the life of crime, you will run your business in Mexico and the US.
